tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,
review:
The Short Review:

Arthur Ward says "the good teacher explains, the superior teacher demonstrates, and a great teacher inspires".
Having gone through our experience of pregnancy and delivery, we  want to say, a good gynaec explains your options, the superior gynaec has years of experience and a great gynaec gives you time and the confidence you need to cope with the toughest moments during this journey. 
Dr Triveni was a great gynaec for us. 

It was through reviews like these we decided to consult with her right from the time we decided to conceive last June. We are so glad and thankful to these reviews for guiding us to her and more than grateful to her for making this journey absolutely memorable. 

The Long Review:

Here are just a few anecdotes from our pregnancy and birthing experience with Dr. Triveni: 

Friendly & Approachable: During the 9 months+ of our interaction, we developed a great rapport with her. My wife came to believe in her experience and expertise completely. We were ready to follow her suggestion every step of the way. During labor, there are 100s of things that can go haywire, and having her helped us choose our options wisely. 
 
Gives You Time: During our interactions she patiently took the time to answer each of our questions. (Being first time parents, we did have a lot of questions). Few of our consults took 30+ mins (esp. towards the end of our journey), and she never ended any of these meetings in haste. Whenever we felt that things were getting out of control, she was just a WhatsApp message away. This felt quite reassuring. 

Scientific & Experience-based Advice: Her recommendations on delivery procedures (ex: episiotomy during a normal delivery) and pregnancy practices (ex: supplementation/exercises) are based on scientific trials that are done with Indian women and her past experience. She helped us understand the reasoning behind every single call / suggestion of hers

Tailored Approach - Dr.Triveni is quite perceptive and experienced - she tailored her approach based on things beyond the hospital room too - for example - stuff like my wife's daily physical activity, prior scan and test reports etc.,

Gives you Confidence - At one point when we had almost decided to go the C-route, our doctor's call and faith in my wife helped us to stay the course and finally she had a normal delivery. Having experienced the attitude of other duty doctors first hand, we can't emphasize how important this is. It makes all the difference. 

Apart from our gynaec, we would also like to thank her team of support doctors and experienced nurses (esp. Aniyamma) at Cloudnine who provided us the best care and support before, during and after the birth of our baby. 

For such an important journey in life, we strongly recommend Dr.Triveni and the Cloudnine Team (for their experience and processes). **** *** ****** ***** *** **** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and support Dr. Triveni provided me during my first pregnancy. Your dedication, responsiveness, and patience have made a profound impact on my journey to motherhood.From the very first appointment, your warm and welcoming demeanor put me at ease. Your attentiveness in listening to my concerns, both big and small, made me feel heard and valued as a patient. Your willingness to patiently address each question and explain all the details related to my pregnancy allowed me to make informed decisions and feel confident in the choices I made.

Her expertise *** ********* in the field of obstetrics and gynecology were evident throughout the entire process. Her guidance and support during prenatal visits, ultrasounds, and check-ups were invaluable. She not only monitored the health of my baby but also ensured my well-being, physically and emotionally.
I cannot thank Dr. Triveni enough for her responsiveness and availability, especially during moments of worry or uncertainty. Herr promptness in returning my calls and addressing my concerns promptly alleviated any anxieties I had. Knowing that I had her support and guidance gave me the strength and confidence to navigate the ups and downs of pregnancy.
Her genuine care and compassion have left a lasting impression on me. I am grateful for Dr. Triveni's tireless efforts and dedication to ensuring a healthy and positive pregnancy experience.
Thank you, Dr. Triveni, for being more than just a doctor. Thank you for being a source of comfort, reassurance* *** *********. I am incredibly grateful to have had you by my side during this special journey.

With heartfelt appreciation,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I’m visiting Dr. Triveni since 8+ months at Cloud Nine Hospital Sahakaranagar. During my pregnancy and childbirth, Dr. Triveni has been extremely understanding and empathetic towards my concerns. She’s been patient with me the whole time & has been very explicit about the processes to follow keeping in mind that I was a first time mom. In my 5th month we got to know that the placenta has gone down but until last month Dr. Triveni assured me with positivity that it should come up & it did. *** ****** *** ** ** ****** *********** ********** *********** During delivery, I never thought that I will be able to deliver vaginally but Dr. Triveni and her team monitored me closely and encouraged me for NVD. I would recommend Dr. Triveni especially for all first time moms who are looking for a doctor with a patient and friendly ear. Lastly, I would also appreciate her responsiveness- be it on WhatsApp or on calls, she is very swift and careful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Normal delivery, pregnancyWe are very happy that we met Dr.Triveni for my pregnancy.Throughout the journey she was very supportive and I was very confident under her.  she has cleared all my doubts with patience, even though I had gestational diabetes in my last trimester, doctor ensured that I deliver naturally. She was always available when I most needed her. she never prescribed any unnecessary medicine or tests. She has encouraged me a lot in the labour room and gave me the confidence, that I can do it.I surely recommend her without any second thought, you will be under safe hands with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi all. My wife and I started consulting Triveni Ma'am since October 2021. This was our first pregnancy. Cloudnine SahakarNagar was closest to our house and we booked online to visit. Fortunately we booked Triveni Ma'am. We had no prior knowledge or recommendation for her so we were no sure what to expect. But after that first consultation till today (July 2022) she has been truly exceptional. We were a demanding client as we are based abroad and only wanted to come to India for 1st trimester and then delivary, she helped us on what's app, answered our calls and was truly present throughout the pregnancy journey. We were blessed with a baby boy on 22/June/2022 and the delivery experience with Triveni Ma'am was also great. Her greatest strength I feel is her poise and relaxed nature and her toolkit is full of knowledge, patience and maturity.

Thank you again Triveni Ma'am for all your help in bringing our beautiful baby boy into this world. 

We recommend her whole heartedly.

Tej and Rahul
**********************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I am very happy that we made the right decision to approach Dr. Triveni during the 7th month of our pregnancy. Dr. Triveni is a very friendly and approachable doctor and answered all our queries pateintly. At every visit from 7th month, she was accurate and guided about the care to be taken. Her positivity and smile throughout the labor pain helped me deliver my baby normally. Despite long labor of more than 15 hours, the doctor was patient and helped us with a normal delivery. 

We highly recommend Dr. Triveni for pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Iam very happy that I have selected the best doctor. I have conceived after 5 years so I was very tensed before selecting the doctor who will the best doctor. My friend suggested the triveni madam. After visiting madam, my all fear gone. My pregnancy journey went very smoothly with madam suggestions. Every time I used to disturb madam with small small doubts but madam didn't hesitate to answer my silly questions also. Now I gave birth to my little prince. Thank you madam for your support through out my pregnancy.  Now triveni madam is like my family doctor what I feel.  I recommend triveni madam 100 out of 100 percent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to take a moment to express my gratitude for the service provided by Triveni madam. I have visited her from the starting of my pregnancy. She made my pregnancy journey smoother. Her friendliness and the way of treatment made me to overcome my fear in pregnancy. And mostly she made me to do all the exercises which helped me during my labour. And the best part is I had delivered my baby within 4 hours of labour time even though I'm first time expecting mom. Thanks is a small word for the bundle of joy arrived in our life through her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Iam short of words while writing this. Dr Triveni is the one who gave us the best gift in our live after such a long wait. I started visiting her since the start of my pregnancy journey at Cloudnine Sahakara nagar and I am deeply grateful to her for all the medical advice and emotional support she offered during our journey. She is always available to answer all the concerns.  Considering my advanced maternal age, she managed my pregnancy so well and even made a normal delivery at 40 look so easy.  She is truly a blessing, *** **** ****** *** *** **** ****** *** ********* ******** We will be forever grateful to Dr Triveni for such a support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My pregnancy consultation with Dr Triveni started at the beginning of 8th month as I got myself transferred from the cloudnine old airport road to HRBR. She was referred to me by Dr Shobha Venkat. From the very first visit of mine with Dr Triveni, I found her very friendly * **************  My whole antenatal, intranatal & postnatal period went smoothly under the supervision of Dr Triveni. Nd i delivered a baby boy via normal delivery. I would strongly recommend her to all the mom- to- be for their most important happy journey of life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would easily suggest anyone who is in the pregnancy phase to consult Triveni Ma'am without any hesitation. She comes across as a a very friendly doctor who invests her time in the discussions explaining things in simple language, patiently lets us ask the questions we have in mind and suggests resolutions and remedies accordingly. She has been a constant support to us during the 9 months of our pregnancy journey, guiding us along the way. She is very much accessible on whatsapp also, if we need any quick resolutions.  

In the current world where one can hardly get 5 min to discuss things with doctors, its very hard to find some one like Dr. Triveni is a blessing, who patiently explains and clarifies doubts / apprehensions. Would definitely suggest her to friends and family :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Triveni is a blessing! She is the most humble, most patient, and most smiling doctors we have met. God blessed us with a child last week through a normal delivery that was well-planned and executed flawlessly by Dr. Triveni. She has been there with us throughout the 9-months journey, answers every little question, avoids medication & unnatural methods unless absolutely necessary, and most importantly, is a doctor you can trust. We pray she is rewarded abundantly for her good deeds, may she always keep smiling and continue to bring joy to many more families.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,
review: Dr. Triveni is experienced *** *** ** *** **** ***** ****** * **** ******* ** ***. She not only made my pregnancy journey easy but also helped, mentored and suggested best things on progressive consultations. Her availability and promt response to  address minor to critical concerns helped me to have memorable journey till delivery. Her caring attitude and immense knowledge is boon for pregnant women to complete motherhood journey. Highly recommend her based on my experience. Doctors are next to God and she proved it for multiple occassions during my tenure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to thank a lot Dr Triveni ma'am, very friendly person and atmost care taken, Dr explained my mother the easiest way of Lap hysterectomy for very big fibroids in that major one 8 cm, then madam properly managed diabetes, HB and BP before and at the time of surgery. We are happy and felt it's a easy process due to the confidence she excudes. Finally surgery completed in 1 hr and post ICU moved to room in 2 hrs. Within 1 day my mom is able to walk for few steps and doing her routine. The next day we returned to home in our car. Every thing possible only because of  Dr Triveni madam. God bless u always..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr.Triveni first for a preconception visit. It is truly God's plan we found her. I liked her approach and positive attitude and decided to see her for my pregnancy as well. After our first scan, we got to know that we conceived twins. Dr.Triveni explained the type of twining and gave us the best advice to ensure a smooth pregnancy. Through the course of my pregnancy, Dr.Triveni was available via chat and also saw every one of my scan report (20 scans in total). She advised on the right additional medications to take to prolong my pregnancy to 36 weeks. I delivered healthy twin boys via a scheduled c section. I would 100% recommend Dr.Triveni. she is thorough and positive in her approach. She is proactive and gives the best medical support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I am so grateful for you Doctor.

There are not enough words for me to express my gratitude . Because of your excellent care and assistance, I have achieved my family goal of 2 deliveries that too normal delivery..
Thank you for all the care that you have given me over the past 4 years. 
You have made sure that I was always given the best care.


The second bigg support for me in the labour room: Nursing staff.
The person in labour can’t think of anything except handling pain , but staff support at that tough times was really amazing and remarkable- sincere thanks to entire team.


Here comes the cherry of the cake : bill payment 
Insurance team is very very cool and supportive, they were very receptive and suggest what is needed , just submit the same and job done ✅.

Finally a big thanks to Dr.Triveni mam and cloud nine sahakar nagar team.

My experience was the best 💐💐

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was serendipity that brought us to Dr. Triveni. Right from the 1st meeting we were at ease mainly due to the confidence and optimism that she exudes.(it sounds a bit cliche, believe me, you have to go through the emotions we went to really understand this) 
A thorough professional, excellent time sense, tech savvy (As 1st time parents you would have tons of questions that can't wait till the next appointment, she responded to all our queries be it on WhatsApp, SMS or telegram at the 1st opportunity, even when she wasn't in the country)
Her prognosis and diagnosis is spot on. Excellent planning and preparedness under any situation. The result, we have our bundle of joy with us!!!
If you are consulting Dr. Triveni, rest assured you are in safe hands. Just listen and do exactly what she recommends. You will see the results for yourself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very lucky to have Dr Triveni during my maternity journey as I have an autoimmune condition.She handled my case with positive attitude and guided us at every situation with friendly manner which reduced our stress. Our whole journey of pregnancy was very beautiful and smooth. My husband and I would highly recommend her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr.Triveni is the one who gave the best gift of our life.  She is very friendly and patiently answers to all our doubts. I was consulting her from the start of my pregnancy journey and i would highly recomend her for all  the mom to be for smooth pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.triveni Arun akkiraju is one of the most experienced & simple city dr .we started pregnancy jurney with dr and i delivered baby boy in HRBR c9 hospital she is like awesome doctor good explanation provided time patients i will recommend 💯 .me and my husband deeply discuss about Dr . triveni Arun and we decided future family place one and only dr.triveni .Thanku so much Dr.triveni  madam and god bless you with healthy life and happiness in u r life 💕,🙏🙏🙏🙏🫄🤱.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Triveni helped & guided us to conceive and during whole pregenecy period. She was always available to help during emergency time. Also guided so many times over the phone. We have build up good relationship with mam and regular touch with more than 2.5 years and never faced any issues. She is Trustable & very soft, helpful in nature. Recommend dr triveni if anyone need good gynecologist in bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I consulted Dr.Triveni for my second delivery and it was a wonderful experience and journey with her. She is such a nice doctor and ì and my husband was very comfortable with her. She explains everything in detail and for all my queries she used to answer even through messages also. She is very friendly and very efficient doctor. My pregnancy journey was very good and enjoyed a lot with the help of Dr.Triveni and was a wonderful experience with her. I highly recommend Dr.Triveni.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
She has been the most attentive and patient while responding any of our queries. One of best thing about Dr. Triveni is she never recommended unnecessary supplements or medical test which made our pregnancy journey all natural and healthy.

She was 24/7 available for any kind of emergency and guidance required. Her experience clearly reflects in her treatment.

I delivered a healthy baby boy without any complections by her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First of all i need to thank Dr. Thriveni ma'am.
On my first pregnancy consultation itself i liked way of explanation and friendlyness, never felt that I'm talking to doctor she was that much friendly. 
I am very happy that being her patient thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Triveni helped us to take good decision throughout my pregnancy .And she is a doctor for me she is god for my family members .There is no words to explain to explain abt her . I was too fatty I thought I would go for csection but the doctor gave me hope for normal delivery and at last I had been for normal delivery this is were the doctor stands for us . I will surely recommend all my friends and relatives to meet her all superb doctor love u doctor thanks for needs to us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very calm and composed, she makes us understand our problem and situation very well rather than making us panic. She is very approachable and takes care of her patients with so much responsibility. She is always a go to person for me and my family. She guides and keep a track of our health with lots of patience. She manages complex pregnancy situations very well. I thank Dr.Triveni so much for handling my pregnancy so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
**** ****** *** ********* ************* Very friendly and caring

We have been to other "popular" doctors, but never felt good in terms of making us clear about each and every doubt we have. Though she is busy she took out time for us.

There was an emergency at a point of time and we had the best experience with her in those though times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor was very friendly. Usually she works as helping hand with dr praveena shenoi. Once she was not there , so we went to her. 

She was very relaxing, my wife was not feeling well. She calmed her down very nicely. Even shared her number to discuss if something urgent.  She guides very well throughout the pregnancy really well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is very good doctor,my delivery was done by her and as I was an anemic and low bp patient entire my nine months was taken care and doctor tried her best for normal delivery which was quite challenging for her and was successfull.Thank you doctor for all your efforts..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review: Would like to thank her for being there for the whole journey to bring home our first little princess. We met her right after finding about pregnancy and since then she has been our guiding star. Why we chose her as our doc was very simple - We felt friendly, at ease, clear and straight communication, always there for us replying to our silly queries even at 2 am. Always felt like we were talking and discussing with a family member. We were referred Couldnine by our close friends with few doctors name, but after meeting her we didn't feel like going anywhere else, as in our first consultantion itself, we felt the confidence and positivity and immediately had that doc patient bond. We would like to thank her from the bottom of our heart. We highly recommend her to all of you reading this and also to our friends family and neighbours. Thank you Dr. Triveni for everything, wish you all the best. God Bless You 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,
review: I am really thankful to Dr Triveni during my whole pregnancy journey .Every individual doctor has their own  way of treatment but the skills what Dr Triveni has cannot be compete with anyone else.Her experienced,Innovative skills of solving and friendly news and simple way of fruitful discussion that she always carries will heal all the problems.She is simply the best I would strongly recommend to every to experience and enjoy every moment of pregnancy with such an experienced doctor.thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such an amazing experienced we had in cloudnine hospital with Dr Triveni during  my wifes pregnancy.Her friendly nature towards the patients, innovative solution and knowledge and her skill always heals every problem of patients. I would strongly recommend her for you all to experience the most valuable moment of your pregnancy with Dr Triveni once. The experiences will tell you the story then you will be witnessed with lots of amazing and will take you a different world. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a good experience with Triveni mam, she is very friendly. I started with my first trimester checkup and had a vaginal delivery. My entire pregnancy journey was very smooth and nice I strongly recommend Triveni mam for your pregnancy journey.
